welcome.description:
🤖 **Doyobi Diary** will help you track your activity.

Choose an action:

settings.title: ⚙️ Settings
settings.frequency_help:
📊 **Notification Frequency Settings**

Send command:
`/freq N`

Where N is minutes between notifications
Example: `/freq 120` (every 2 hours)
settings.window_updated: Now notifications will only arrive during this time.
settings.freq_description: Where N is the interval in minutes between notifications.

friends.title: 👥 **Friends**
friends.subtitle: Manage friends and social connections:
friends.list_empty:
👥 **Friends List**

You don't have any friends yet.
Add friends using `/add_friend @username` command
friends.request_accepted:
✅ Friend request from @{username} accepted!

You are now friends! 🎉
friends.request_not_found: ❌ Friend request from @{username} not found or already processed.
friends.requests_help:
📥 **Friend Requests**

Use commands:
• `/friend_requests` - view requests
• `/accept @username` - accept request
• `/decline @username` - decline request
friends.discover_help:
🔍 **Find Friends**

This feature is under development.
For now use `/add_friend @username` command
friends.activities_help:
📊 **Friend Activities**

Use command:
`/activities [@username]`

Or open web interface for detailed view
friends.recommendations_found: Found {count} recommendations based on your friends
friends.add_more_friends: Add more friends to get recommendations!
friends.rate_limited: ⚠️ Too many requests. Try again later
friends.add_friend_note: Make sure the user is registered in the bot.
friends.add_friend_notification: 👤 User @{username} wants to add you as a friend!
friends.request_not_found: ❌ Friend request from @{username} not found or already processed.
friends.accept_failed: ❌ Failed to accept friend request. It may have already been processed.
friends.decline_failed: ❌ Failed to decline friend request. It may have already been processed.
friends.accept_error: ❌ An error occurred while accepting the request. Try again later.
friends.decline_error: ❌ An error occurred while declining the request. Try again later.

history.title: 📊 Activity History
history.subtitle: Open the web interface to view detailed history:
history.description: Open the web interface to view detailed history:
history.webapp_description: Press the button below to open the web application:

admin.title: 🔧 Admin Panel
admin.admin_only: 🔒 This command is available only to administrators
admin.access_denied: 🔒 This command is only available to administrators.
admin.no_activity_found:
📭 No friend activity found.
You may not have friends yet or they haven't been active.
admin.health_error:
❌ System health check error

Failed to get system status: {error}...
admin.friends_activity_empty_note: You may not have friends yet or they haven't been active.

help.title: ❓ **Help**
help.description: 🤖 **Doyobi Diary** helps you track your activity with smart reminders and multilingual interface.
how_it_works: 1. Send any message to the bot
2. It will be automatically recorded as activity
3. Bot will remind you to report your activities
4. Track statistics in the web interface
friends_info: • Get new friend recommendations through algorithm

errors.general: ❌ An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.general_error: ❌ An error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.notification_failed: ⚠️ Failed to send notification to user {user_id}
errors.rate_limit: ⚠️ Rate limit exceeded. Please try again later.
errors.broadcast_not_found: ❌ Error: broadcast text not found. Try again with /broadcast
errors.time_window_update_error: ❌ Error updating time window. Try again later.
errors.settings_update_error: ❌ Error updating settings. Try again later.
errors.frequency_update_error: ❌ Error updating frequency. Try again later.

common.error_save: ❌ Failed to record activity. Please try again.

activity.recorded_old_notification: Recorded! (Old notification, but question is active)
activity.recorded_old_question: Recorded! (This question is no longer active)

notifications.reminder:
⏰ Time to report!

What have you been doing? Send something to the bot.

voice.error_not_configured: ❌ Voice messages not configured. Contact administrator.

feedback.title: 💬 Feedback
feedback.description: Help us improve the bot! Choose the type of feedback:
feedback.bug_report_description:
**Report a bug**

Describe the problem you encountered:
feedback.feature_request_description:
**Suggest improvement**

Describe your suggestion for improving the bot:
feedback.general_description:
**General feedback**

Share your opinion about the bot:
feedback.enter_description: Write your description in one message:
feedback.success:
✅ Your message has been sent!

🔗 **Link to your issue:**
{issue_url}

You can track the processing status using this link. We will review your message soon!

Thank you for helping us improve Doyobi Diary! 🙏
feedback.success_no_link:
✅ Your message has been sent!

We will review your message soon.

Thank you for helping us improve Doyobi Diary! 🙏
feedback.session_expired: ⏰ Feedback session expired. Please start again.
feedback.rate_limited: ⚠️ You are sending messages too frequently. Please try later.
feedback.error: ❌ An error occurred while sending your message. Please try later.

questions.title: 📝 **My Questions**
questions.create_instruction: 📝 Enter the text of the new question:
questions.delete_warning: ⚠️ This action cannot be undone. Delete question?
questions.list_empty: 📝 You don't have any additional questions yet
questions.template_create_help: 💡 Create a question based on a template
questions.templates_help: 🎯 Ready-made question templates for quick creation
questions.description: Manage your personal questions for activity tracking:
questions.edit_instructions:
ℹ️ When changing text, a new version of the question will be created.
Old answers will remain linked to the old text.
questions.error_name_exists: ❌ Question with this name already exists
questions.help_variables:
💡 Available variables:
• {name} - user name
• {time} - current time

Example: Hello, {name}! What are you doing at {time}?

broadcast.enter_message:
📢 **Broadcast Message**

Enter the message text to send to all users:
broadcast.create_description: Send message text to broadcast to all users.
